description:
Fetch illustration from Pixiv and provides them as a wallpaper source for muzei

Muzei's Pixiv Image source

A simple app that automatically fetches illustrations from Pixiv and provides them as a wallpaper source for muzei.

Function

  • Scheduled updating (Muzei function)
  • Image history (Muzei feature)
  • Updates only when using WiFi (Muzei feature)< /li>
  • Download original resolution image
  • Random sorting
  • Fetch number limit
  • Auto clear old images
  • Quick sharing
  • Download image using mirror
  • SNI Bypass
  • Supported modes
    • Recommended
    • Favorites
    • Ranking (daily, weekly, monthly)
  • Filter
    • Image resolution
    • Number of views
    • Number of favorites
    • NSFW illusts
